meta.name: Line Creed
meta.inspiration: Dragon Ball Z, Pokemon, 90s anime aesthetic, fantasy adventure RPGs

style: Short, punchy sentences that build momentum

examples.goodHeadline: Power Up Your Swing! Collect Legendary Clubs and Conquer Fantasy Courses!
examples.badHeadline: Professional Golf Simulation for Serious Players

audience.primary: Nostalgic millennials (25-40) who grew up with DBZ/Pokemon
audience.secondary: Mobile gamers who love progression systems and collection
audience.tertiary: Casual golf fans looking for something fresh and fun
painPoints: Golf games are too serious and realistic
Mobile games lack personality and soul
Missing the energy and excitement of 90s anime
Want progression and collection, not just simulation
desiredOutcomes: Collect and upgrade legendary golf equipment
Progress through fantasy courses like RPG dungeons
Experience golf as an epic adventure

aspirations: Relive that Saturday morning anime excitement
Collect all the legendary clubs (gotta catch 'em all!)
Become a golf champion in a fantasy world

emotionalJourney.arrival: WHOA! This looks like the anime golf game of my dreams!
emotionalJourney.engagement: This is SO fun - I'm actually excited about golf!
emotionalJourney.conversion: I NEED to collect all the legendary clubs!

imagery: Energy effects (auras, power lines, speed streaks)
Fantasy golf courses (floating islands, lava hazards, crystal forests)

dbz.elements: Energy auras, power-up transformations, bold orange/blue, speed lines, dramatic impact frames
dbz.avoid: Direct character copying - take the ENERGY, not the IP

pokemon.elements: Collection progression, evolution systems, bright optimistic colors, friendly adventure vibe
pokemon.avoid: Copying creature designs - take the COLLECTION EXCITEMENT

90sAnime.elements: Bold outlines, saturated colors, dynamic angles, speed lines, comic panels, gradient backgrounds
90sAnime.modernize: Clean up the rough edges, higher fidelity, but keep the SOUL

colorStrategy.philosophy: Saturated, bold, unapologetic. This is NOT subtle - it's a power fantasy!

mustAvoid: Generic mobile game tropes without personality
Dark patterns or predatory monetization visuals
mustRespect: WCAG AA minimum for UI text (AAA where possible)
Nostalgia without being dated - modern execution of 90s energy
Fast load times despite rich visuals
Clarity in UI despite bold aesthetics

specificRequirements: Colorblind-safe palette (don't rely on color alone)
High contrast mode option for accessibility
Motion can be reduced without losing personality
Clear hit states on all interactive elements

referenceWebsites.whatToTake: Color boldness, sense of power and energy
referenceWebsites.whatToAvoid: Don't copy designs - we're not DBZ, we're golf!

referenceWebsites.whatToTake: Sense of adventure and collection, bright palette
referenceWebsites.whatToAvoid: Cutesy overload - we want epic, not just cute

referenceWebsites.whatToTake: Clean UI execution with bold personality

visualReferences: DBZ: Cell Saga color palette (orange, blue, green)
90s trading cards: Holographic effects, bold borders
Anime opening sequences: Dynamic motion, speed lines

gameFeatures.collection: Collect legendary clubs with unique abilities (gotta swing 'em all!)
gameFeatures.progression: Power up your golfer, unlock new courses, evolve equipment
gameFeatures.fantasy: Magical hazards, power-up items, special abilities

seo.tagline: Fantastic Golf Adventures - Collect Legendary Clubs, Conquer Epic Courses!
seo.metaDescriptionTemplate: Line Creed: The fantasy golf adventure inspired by 90s anime! Collect legendary clubs, power up your swing, and conquer epic courses. Golf has never been this EPIC!

customFields.nostalgiaFactor: HIGH - Target the exact feeling of Saturday morning DBZ/Pokemon marathons
customFields.energyLevel: MAXIMUM - Every screen should feel alive and exciting
customFields.monetizationPhilosophy: Generous F2P, premium cosmetics, no pay-to-win
